===Etymology===
Compound of {{etyl|ltc|-}}-derived elements {{compound|lang=ja|sort=けんじ'|元|tr1=gen|t1=original|治|tr2=ji|t2=rule, command}}.  The era name was composed based on [[divination]] using the ''[[I Ching]]''.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|げんじ|acc=1}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|げんじ}}

# the {{w|Genji era}} {{qualifier|February 1864–April 1865}}

====Usage notes====
Preceded by {{ja-r|文久|^ぶんきゅう}} and followed by {{ja-r|慶応|^けいおう}}.  The reigning emperor was {{w|Emperor Kōmei}} ({{lang|ja|孝明}}{{m|ja|天皇}}).
